function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airflow patterns as a vector of virus transmission due to pre-existing physical arrangements.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Optimize ventilation systems and modify physical arrangements to improve airflow patterns.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, and HVAC systems with increased ventilation rates.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially those in close proximity to others.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and ventilation engineers."},{"Description":"Impact of temperature and humidity on virus survival and transmission.","Impact":"Suboptimal environmental conditions may increase the survival and transmission of the virus.","Mitigation":"Maintain optimum temperature and humidity levels in indoor spaces.","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity monitoring systems, HVAC systems with climate control.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces.","Owner":"Facility managers, HVAC technicians."},{"Description":"Challenges in communication and social interaction due to physical distancing measures.","Impact":"Reduced fluency in communication and difficulty in perceiving body language and speech.","Mitigation":"Adapt physical spaces to enable clear communication while maintaining physical distancing.","Technologies":"Acoustic design enhancements, communication technology for remote interactions.","People":"Occupants of physical spaces, especially those with communication-dependent tasks.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, facility managers."}]}
